meta.content: MISSION: Aldo Leopold Charter School provides an engaging and challenging educational program emphasizing direct experience, inquiry learning, stimulation of the creative process, and stewardship...

div.style: height: auto;vertical-align: middle;background-image: url("/uploads/1/1/5/7/115705285/background-images/1931459657.jpg") ;background-repeat: no-repeat ;background-position: 50% 50% ;background-size: 100% ;background-color: transparent ;background-size: cover;

h2.font:
Aldo Leopold Charter School
THINK OUTSIDE THE DESK

font.font: "it evolves in the minds of a thinking community."

span.style: display: block; clear: both; height: 0px; overflow: hidden;

font.font: MISSION: Aldo Leopold Charter School provides an engaging and challenging educational program emphasizing direct experience, inquiry learning, stimulation of the creative process, and stewardship of our community and natural environment.

strong.font: Aldo Leopold Charter School graduates will use the skills, perspectives, and information they gain at school to enhance their own lives and to advance social, economic, and environmental sustainability.

font.span:
1422 Hwy. 180 E
Silver City, New Mexico, 88061
Phone: 575.538.2547
Fax: 575.388.4970

font.font: -I have purposely presented the land ethic as a product of social evolution because nothing so important as an ethic is ever 'written' ...
